item.text: Paul has created a number of sites
Paul has created a number of Federated Wiki sites for himself.
Thoughts, mainly, about the development of Federated Wiki.
item.title: Thoughts on Federated Wiki

item.text: Site used during the first Federated Wiki Happening, at the end of 2014.
item.title: FedWiki Happening

item.text: Think of forage as a Commonplace Book, in Federated Wiki. This site is the entry point into a set of annual sites, listed below.
item.title: Forage

item.text: A federated wiki for 2015's miscellany for thoughts, ideas and moments of serendipity.
item.title: Forage 2015
